original_text: Punishment will come to anyone who insults his father, or who refuses to listen to his mother. Wild birds will pick out his eyes and vultures will eat his body. Punishment will come to anyone who insults his father, or who refuses to listen to his mother. Wild birds will pick out his eyes and vultures will eat his body. Punishment will come to anyone who insults his father, or who refuses to listen to his mother. Wild birds will pick out his eyes and vultures will eat his body. Punishment will come to anyone who insults his father, or who refuses to listen to his mother. Wild birds will pick out his eyes and vultures will eat his body.
korean_text: 아비를 조롱하며 어미 순종하기를 싫어하는 자의 눈은 골짜기의 까마귀에게 쪼이고 독수리 새끼에게 먹히리라

sentences.original_text: Punishment will come
to anyone who insults his father
or who refuses to listen to his mother
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 어머니의 말을 듣기를 거부하는 사람에게

sentences.original_text: Wild birds will pick out his eyes
and vultures will eat his body
